venue.address_1: 1353 Beacon Street - Brookline/ Boston near Kenmore sq
venue.name: Rani's Restaurant & Lounge

item.description:
Glitz Glamour 2012 NYE Party Boston's biggest desi dance party organizer - GenerationDesi is back with their 10 year in a row NYE bash 2012.

We bring you Boston's most successful desi parties. The party starts at 10pm goes on till 2:00 am.

Your and our favorate DJ Bailu and DJ Jaywill be rocking the best Bollywood, Bhangra, desi hits all night long!!

You know how we do it. Limited Tickets for this party. Please get your tickets early. Party favors! Tiara's for the ladies! NYE Hats for the gents! Lei's/Garlands! Blow horns!!

Limited Free complimentary appetizers provided by Rani's through out the night. Mid Night Champagne Toast!!

Dance till you cant stop!!

Dont miss this top Bhangra, Bollywood party...we will have imitators..but we strive to bring you the BEST! Located on the Green Line "B" MBTA - "Summit St T Stop".

Plenty of Parking. Right in Coolidge Corner, Boston/Brookline, MA. Near Kenmore Square

Advanced Ticket pricing: $15 per person for Single. $25 for Couple and Groups. Please get em early. Ticket prices will go up and we will sell out!

Tickets available at http://www.Generationdesi.com & www.Bostondesinye.com
item.name: Glitz & Glamour 2012-NYE Party
